item.title: Lab 4: Parkour
item.description: How to open a folder as a Unity Project Double-clicking Scene file opens the project in unity. (It might cause crash of Unity). Then restart hub and select a unity version for it. 12.22 Try to apply joystick but all operation are mirrorred. ========= Notes: Ways to update the pages: Git command as follow: rm -rf docs (optional) Hugo git add . git commit -m â€œsomething" git push origin master
